headline: Cboe Global Markets (BATS:CBOE) Elevates Tim Lipscomb To Executive VP Driving Tech Innovation Globally
summary: Cboe Global Markets (BATS:CBOE) experienced a 4% price increase over the last quarter, coinciding with significant executive leadership changes and technological advancements. The promotion of Tim Lipscomb to Executive Vice President and Chief Technology Officer reflects the company's focus on leveraging technology for growth, which has been demonstrated by successful platform migrations and improved global uptime. headline: Nasdaq plans 24-hour trading as global appetite for US stocks grows
summary: (Reuters) -Nasdaq Inc plans to introduce 24-hour trading on its flagship U.S. exchange to capitalize on growing global demand for U.S. equities, a senior executive said in a social media post on Friday.  International demand for the lucrative U.S. equity market has surged in recent years, driven by rising retail participation, increasing financial literacy, and easier access to digital trading platforms.  The exchange operator has started discussions with regulators and expects to launch 24-hour, five-days-a-week trading in the second half of 2026, Nasdaq President Tal Cohen wrote in a LinkedIn post.

headline: Cboe Announces Promotion of Chief Technology Officer Tim Lipscomb to Executive Vice President
summary: Cboe Global Markets, Inc. (Cboe: CBOE), the world's leading derivatives and securities exchange network, today announced the promotion of Tim Lipscomb to Executive Vice President, Chief Technology Officer, and appointment to the company's executive leadership team. In this role, Mr. Lipscomb will continue to oversee the expansion of Cboe's technology platform globally, further reinforcing the importance of technology and innovation to the company's organic growth strategy.

headline: CBOE Stock Rises 9.1% YTD: A Signal for Investors to Hold Tight?
summary: Cboe Global stock gains on the back of strong market position, global reach, proprietary product strength and solid capital position.
